import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {
  
  public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
    int[] val = new int[(int)1e6 + 1];
    int n = in.nextInt();
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
      val[in.nextInt()]++;
    long res = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < val.length; i++) {
      if (val[i] != 0) 
        res += val[i] * (long)(n - val[i]);
    }
    System.out.print(res / 2);
  }
}
